or <denchmark-code>Add your configuration overrides on this file any configuration changes done to default**s**.yml will be lost! </denchmark-code>
but actually the file is in: /etc/pwnagotchi/default.yml I din't modify the pwnagotchi/builder/pwnagotchi.yml file myself because I saw that there are references to defaults.yml also in: pwnagotchi/utils.py or setup.py and I didn't want to create any other errors. I prefer that you look at us, you know the project better than me. Environment (please complete the following information):
